body:
Isn't it wholesome? Hehehahah yeah get fucked vanilla fags. Shouldn't have clicked on this with its cover clearly telling you what you were in for but you did anyways, you masochist.
Why does this show's bitch get a lot of ntr? Simple, she acts slutty, I believe the japs call it a "kuso mesugaki", hence why her and the clueless mc find themselves often depicted in such scenario. Come on, I know most of you shouldn't be on this site, let alone clicking/tapping on ntr stuff, but shit, this isn't rocket science. Japs have been doing this before your parents allowed you un-supervised internet access, even before you were born, and much like back then, it's just hentai.
they're kids, you son of a bitch - raiden

imagine getting upset over fictional ntr lmao

But can this be considered NTR though? Mc knew nothing about it, so isn't it just cheating? Correct me if I'm wrong. I thought NTR supposed to be either mc knew, or even if mc doesn't know, the other half left mc for the other person forever because they loved the fucking so much?
Just pretend the guy doing the fucking is the MC.
